    • top

      public Filling top()
      Checks which Filling object is on top of the Bottle In case of the Bottle being empty returns null
      Returns:
      Filling object that is on top of the Bottle
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - in case of the Bottle being empty

    • spaceAvailable

      public int spaceAvailable()
      Checks how much space there is left on the Bottle
      Returns:
      Integer representing the number of empty spaces left on the Bottle

    • pourOut

      public void pourOut()
      Pours out the Filling object on the top of the Bottle

    • receive

      public boolean receive(Filling s)
      In case there is space puts a Filling object on the first free position of the Bottle
      Parameters:
      s - the Filling object to put on the Bottle
      Returns:
      false case the Bottle is full or the top Filling object of the Bottle being different from the given one otherwise it puts the object on the first free position and returns true

    • size

      public int size()
      Gets the size of the Bottle
      Returns:
      Integer representing the size of the Bottle

    • isSingleFilling

      public boolean isSingleFilling()
      Checks if the content of the Bottle is all the same
      Returns:
      true if the Bottle is filled with only one type of Filling otherwise false

    • getContent

      public Filling[] getContent()
      Gets the content of the Bottle
      Returns:
      a copy of the content of the Bottle
